pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create Simple Yet Powerful HTML Documents with Light Weight CSS Frameworks // Create minimal, responsive, and style-agnostic HTML documents with the lightweight CSS frameworks such as 'sakura', 'Water.css', and 'mini.css'. Powerful features include floating table of contents as a sidebar, code folding of source, output, message, warning, and error, and accordion menus. They work without JavaScript.
